definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: Please suppress the use of all Phone Banking Services for the above-mentioned Primary Account.
sentences.chinese: 請終止有關上述基本戶口所有電話理財服務。

sentences.english: See this report on Caixin Online.
In Buddhism, the giving of wealth consists of external and internal wealth.
sentences.chinese: 財佈施，在佛法裏面又把它分爲內財與外財。

sentences.english: The President laid out a number of steps for greater fiscal responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 總統展示了幾項更大政財責任的步驟。

sentences.english: Teenagers make a fortune on Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 青少年在農曆新年時都會發一筆財。

definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
